## Opal.fetch() method

Fetch a Database Manifest

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fetch(address: Address, options?: FetchOptions): Promise<Manifest>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | [Address](./opal.address.md) | the Address of the Manifest to fetch |
|  options | [FetchOptions](./opal.fetchoptions.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Manifest](./opal.manifest.md)<!-- -->&gt;


## Remarks

Convenience method for using `Manifest.fetch`<!-- -->.
